lead_paragraph: The department store operator Macy’s, which said it would close 100 stores, jumped 17 percent. Kohl’s climbed 16 percent.

headline.print_headline: Stocks End at Record Highs, Bolstered by Retailers and Oil
headline.main: Stocks End at Record Highs, Bolstered by Retail and Oil

snippet: The department store operator Macy’s, which said it would close 100 stores, jumped 17 percent. Kohl’s climbed 16 percent....
abstract: Stocks close at record highs due to increasing oil prices and strong earnings from several department stores.
